tiles

Class BoulderWater

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiles.BoulderWater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connectable, Movable, Tile, WaterTile

    public class BoulderWater
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tile, Movable, Connectable, WaterTile
    Author:
    Jelmer Firet a tile that acts as sheep and as water the sheep on this tile can only be pushed onto land tiles connects to neighbouring water tiles (Water, BoulderWater, PlayerWater, Void)
